  • var.bound

Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. if (!Function.prototype.bind) {
  4.   Function.prototype.bind = function (context) {
  5.     if (typeof this !== 'function') {
  6.       throw new TypeError('Function.prototype.bind - what is trying to be bound is not callable');
  7.     }
  8.     var curried = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);
  9.     var original = this;
  10. ‌    var NoOp = function () {};
  11. ‌    var bound = function () {
  12.       var ctx = this instanceof NoOp && context ? this : context;
  13.       var args = curried.concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments));
  14.       return original.apply(ctx, args);
  15.     };
  16.     NoOp.prototype = this.prototype;
  17.     bound.prototype = new NoOp();
  18.     return bound;
  19.   };
  20. }
